bathroom.name: Bathroom
bathroom.description: A small bathroom with a shower to the left. Toiletries sat idling in cups stacked along the window sill.
bathroom.start: You trudge into the bathroom half-awake and make your way to the cabinet.

location.name: bathroom-mirror
location.interaction: *you stare at yourself in the shiny mirror under good lighting* Tip: you can only see your stats when looking into a reflective surface.

location.name: cabinet
location.interaction: *you reach out to grab your toothbrush*

interaction.creature: Fighting increases your resilience - you can't flee forever.

bathroom.exit: You hastily leave the room, tap still running.

bedroom.name: Your bedroom
bedroom.description: Your safe place - nothing can hurt you here. Equipped with beautiful hanging lights and posters from your favourite Anime.
bedroom.start: Time to get sorted for the day.

interaction.item: you take your rucksack off the hook and remember to pocket your ID card.

location.name: door
location.interaction: cya later room :) OH i forgot to turn off my lights...

car.name: Car journey
car.description: A leisurely ride the train station through the apocalyptic utopia of Autodale.
car.start: you hop in the passenger seat, rucksack in hand.

interaction.item: you look behind you to see Octopus sitting lonely on the backseat

train-platform.name: Train platform
train-platform.description: A small train platform in a local village commonly frequented by college students.

location.name: entrance
location.interaction: *you look at the train times to your left*

interaction.item: you look at the bus stop pole and see a sticker

train-platform.exit: You hastily leave the room, tap still running.
